title: The Financial Stability Board in 2019
content: Page 1 of 13     For release on delivery  7:15 a.m. EDT (12:15 p.m. CEST)  March 28, 2019               The Financial Stability Board in 2019         Remarks by     Randal K. Quarles     Vice Chair for Supervision     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     Chair     Financial Stability Board     at     Joint Conference of the European Central Bank and the Journal of Money, Credit, and Banking     Frankfurt, Germany                 March 28, 2019
